mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY REGDATE DESC) NUM, MEMBERVIEW.* FROM MEMBERVIEW WHERE ${field} LIKE '%${query}%' AND REGDATE BETWEEN CONVERT(DATE,#{startDate}) AND CONVERT(DATE,#{endDate})) M WHERE M.NUM BETWEEN 1+(${page}-1)*10 AND 10*${page}
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBERS SET( PASSWORD=#{PASSWORD}, BIRTH=${birth}, PHONE=#{phone}, EMAIL=#{email}, ADDRESS=#{address}, CLASSFICATION=#{classification}, ACADEMICABILITY=#{ACADEMICABILITY}, MAJOR=#{MAJOR}, CAREERYEAR=${CAREERYEAR}, CAREER=#{CAREER}, HOMEPAGE=#{HOMEPAGE}, CURRENTSTATE=#{CURRENTSTATE}, HOPEBUSINESS=#{HOPEBUSINESS}, IMAGENAME=#{imageName}, INTRODUCE=#{introduce}) WHERE MID=#{mid}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBERS (MID,NAME,NICKNAME,GENDER,PASSWORD ,BIRTH,PHONE,EMAIL,ADDRESS,CLASSIFICATION,REGDATE, ACADEMICABILITY,MAJOR,GRADE,CAREERYEAR, CAREER,HOMEPAGE,CURRENTSTATE,HOPEBUSINESS, IMAGENAME, INTRODUCE) VALUES (#{MID},#{NAME},#{NICKNAME},#{GENDER},#{PASSWORD} ,${BIRTH},#{PHONE},#{EMAIL},#{ADDRESS},#{CLASSIFICATION},getDate(), #{ACADEMICABILITY},#{MAJOR},${GRADE},${CAREERYEAR}, #{CAREER},#{HOMEPAGE},#{CURRENTSTATE},#{HOPEBUSINESS}, #{imageName},#{introduce})
